posts.post_title: Group of graded t206 for sale-individually priced-trade added
posts.post_content:
The following t206's for sale or trade. Prices include shipping. Checks, money orders, paypal, cash or trade all ok. Follow the link for scans(click on cards for oversized images). Any questions email [URL="mhgt@embarqmail.com"]mhgt@embarqmail.com[/URL]

[url]http://imageevent.com/mhgt/forsaletrade[/url]


Graham(St. Louis)-EPDG-PSA 6--$275
Hoffman(St. Louis)-Sweet Caporal-PSA 4mk-not sure what the mark is--$33

Would like to trade for the following 150 only cards.
NEED:
Doyle(Throwing)
Reulbach(Glove showing)

My trade cards include the Graham and Hoffman as well as:
Pattee-Piedmont-PSA 4.5
Pattee-Sweet Caporal-PSA 4.5
Schulte-Sweet Caporal-PSA 4
Also have a few Chief Meyers(Polar Bear and Piedmont)SGC 50 and PSA 5.
Scans of these cards can be seen at the link above.

Thanks Mike
